tool_description: Proxy web requests through Residential Proxies (U.S.A). Great for web scraping!
name: Residential Proxy (U.S.A)
title: Residential Proxy (U.S.A)

api_list.name: Residential Proxy
api_list.description:
Proxy requests through a rotating pool of residential proxies based in the USA.

Just specify the URL you want to fetch. 

This API works great for web scraping since we are fetching the URL you provide from residential IP addresses, which are harder to block.
